sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7165d550db52db009c69f8231f9619b0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.azureStorageAccountQualifier</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>azureStorageAccountQualifier</name><script><![CDATA[var azureStorageAccountQualifier = Class.create();
azureStorageAccountQualifier.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	getStorageAccountIDs: function(sys_id){
		var ldcIDs = [];
		var saIDs = [];
		var relation = new GlideRecord("cmdb_rel_ci");
		relation.addQuery('child',sys_id);
		relation.query();
		
		while(relation.next()){
			var logicalDatacenter = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_logical_datacenter");
			logicalDatacenter.addQuery('sys_id',relation.getValue('parent'));
			logicalDatacenter.query();
			if(logicalDatacenter.next()){
				ldcIDs.push(logicalDatacenter.sys_id+'');
			}
		}
		
		relation= new GlideRecord("cmdb_rel_ci");
		relation.addQuery('child',"IN",ldcIDs.toString());
		relation.query();
		
		while(relation.next()){
			var storageAccount = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_cloud_storage_account");
			storageAccount.addQuery('sys_id',relation.getValue('parent'));
			storageAccount.query();
			if(storageAccount.next()){
				saIDs.push(storageAccount.sys_id+'');
			}
		}
		return saIDs.toString();
	},
	type: 'azureStorageAccountQualifier'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-21 19:37:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>7165d550db52db009c69f8231f9619b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>azureStorageAccountQualifier</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7165d550db52db009c69f8231f9619b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 19:52:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: ecc_agent_script_include_01a12003dbca5340e68af05e0f961930
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><name>AzureConfigAlertQueueProbe</name><script><![CDATA[var AzureConfigAlertQueueProbe = Class.create();
AzureConfigAlertQueueProbe.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AzureCloudAPIBase, {
	
	resourceType: 'Microsoft.Storage/queues',
	versionDefault: '2016-12-01',
	
	initialize: function() {
		this.storageAccountName = probe.getParameter('storageAccountName');
		this.accountID = probe.getParameter('storageAccountID');
		this.queueName = probe.getParameter('queueName');
		this.numberOfMessages = probe.getParameter('numberOfMessages');
		this.maxRequests = probe.getParameter('maxRequests');
		this.deleteOnReceipt = probe.getParameter('deleteMessages');
		
		this.baseUrl = 'https://' + this.storageAccountName + '.queue.core.windows.net/' + this.queueName + '/messages';
		
		var credential_id = probe.getParameter('credential_id');
		var credentialProvider = new  Packages.com.snc.commons.credentials.CredentialsProviderFactory.getCredentialsProvider();
		var credential = credentialProvider.getCredentialByID(credential_id);
		
		this.clientId = credential.getAttributeByName('client_id');
		this.tenantId = credential.getAttributeByName('tenant_id');
		this.secretKey = credential.getAttributeByName('secret_key');
		
		var parameters = new Packages.java.util.HashMap();
		var headers = new Packages.java.util.HashMap();

		parameters.put('ClientId',this.clientId);
		parameters.put('TenantId',this.tenantId);
		parameters.put('SecretKey',this.secretKey);
		parameters.put('EndpointURL','https://management.azure.com');
		
		AzureCloudAPIBase.prototype.initialize.call(this, parameters, headers);
		
		this.key = this._getPrimaryKey(this.accountID);
	},
	
	receiveMessages: function(){
		var messageIDs;
		var messages = [];
		
		var url = this.baseUrl;
		if (this.numberOfMessages > 1) {
			url = url+'?numofmessages=' + this.numberOfMessages;
		}
		var invoker = this._getStorageAPIInvoker(url, this.apiVersion,this.key,this.storageAccountName);	
		
		for (var requestCount=0;requestCount < this.maxRequests;requestCount++){
			messageIDs = [];
			
			var response = invoker.invokeGet();
			
			if(response === null) {
				break;
			}
			else {
				if(Array.isArray(response.QueueMessage)){
					for (var index=0;index < response.QueueMessage.length;index++){
						messageIDs.push({
							'id':response.QueueMessage[index].MessageId,
							'popReceipt':response.QueueMessage[index].PopReceipt
						});
						messages.push(response.QueueMessage[index].MessageText);
					}
				}
				else{
					messageIDs.push({
						'id':response.QueueMessage.MessageId,
						'popReceipt':response.QueueMessage.PopReceipt
					});
					messages.push(response.QueueMessage.MessageText);
				}
			}
			
			if(this.deleteOnReceipt){
				var deleteResponse = this.deleteMessageBatch(messageIDs);
			}
		}
		return JSON.stringify(messages);
	},
	
	deleteMessageBatch: function(messageBatch){
		for(var index=0;index<messageBatch.length;index++){
			var url = this.baseUrl;
			url+="/" + messageBatch[index].id + "?popreceipt=" + messageBatch[index].popReceipt;			
			
			var invoker = this._getStorageAPIInvoker(encodeURI(url), this.apiVersion,this.key,this.storageAccountName);
			
			var response = invoker.invokeDelete();
		}
	},
	
	getStorageKey: function(id) {
		var url = this._getActionURL(id, 'listKeys');
		var invoker = this._getAPIInvoker(url, this.apiVersion);
		return invoker.invokePost('');
	},
	
	_getPrimaryKey: function(id) {
		var keys = this.getStorageKey(id);
		return keys.keys[0].value;
	},
	
	_getActionURL: function(id, action) {
		var url = this.getResourceURL(id);
		url += '/' + action;
		return url;
	},
	
	/**
	* Method to get storage storageAPIInvoker
	*/
	_getStorageAPIInvoker: function(url, version, accountKey, accountName) {
		ms.log("URL 1: " + url);
		var apiInvoker = new AzureStorageAPIInvoker_ConfigPatch(url, version, accountKey, accountName);
		var params = {};
		apiInvoker.setParameters(this._getAPIParameters());
		var headers = {};
		apiInvoker.setHeaders(this._getAPIHeaders());
		return apiInvoker;
	},
	
	type: "AzureConfigAlertQueueProbe"
});]]></script><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-17 20:17:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>01a12003dbca5340e68af05e0f961930</sys_id><sys_mod_count>82</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureConfigAlertQueueProbe</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_01a12003dbca5340e68af05e0f961930</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 18:40:07</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4abfe098dbde9b009c69f8231f961970
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AzureQueueProbeRunner</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AzureQueueProbeRunner</name><script><![CDATA[var AzureQueueProbeRunner = Class.create();
AzureQueueProbeRunner.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	runScheduledJob: function(azureConfigDefinitionID){
		var azureConfigDefinitionGR = new GlideRecord('u_azure_config_queue_integration');
		if (!azureConfigDefinitionGR.get(azureConfigDefinitionID)){
			gs.error("Azure Queue Probe Runner: No config definition found for id {0}",azureConfigDefinitionID);
			return;
		}
		
		if(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_active == false){
			gs.error("Azure Queue Probe Runner: Config Definition {0} not active",azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_name);
			this.setJobActiveFlag(azureConfigDefinitionGR);
			return;
		}
		this.runProbe(azureConfigDefinitionGR);
	},
	
	createJob: function(azureConfigDefinitionGR){
		var jobGR = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
		jobGR.initialize();
		jobGR.name = "Azure Queue Config Probe Scheduled Job: " + azureConfigDefinitionGR.getDisplayValue();
		jobGR.active = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_active;
		jobGR.run_type = 'periodically';
		jobGR.run_period.setDateNumericValue(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_poll_frequency * 60000);
		jobGR.run_start.setDisplayValue(gs.nowDateTime());
		jobGR.script = 'var probeRunner = new AzureQueueProbeRunner();\n'
						+ 'probeRunner.runScheduledJob("' + azureConfigDefinitionGR.sys_id + '");';
		jobGR.insert();
		
		return jobGR;
	},
	
	deleteJob: function(azureConfigDefinitionGR){
		if(gs.nil(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job)){
			gs.error("Azure Queue Probe Runner: Job not found for deletion on {0}",azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_name);
			return;
		}
		var jobGR = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job.getRefRecord();
		jobGR.deleteRecord();
	},
	
	setJobActiveFlag: function(azureConfigDefinitionGR){
		if(gs.nil(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job)){
			gs.error("Azure Queue Probe Runner: Job not found for activation/deactivation on {0}",azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_name);
			return;
		}
		var jobGR = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job.getRefRecord();
		jobGR.active = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_active;
		jobGR.update();
	},
	
	updateJobInterval: function(azureConfigDefinitionGR){
		if(gs.nil(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job)){
			gs.error("Azure Queue Probe Runner: Job not found for interval update on {0}",azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_name);
			return;
		}
		var jobGR = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job.getRefRecord();
		jobGR.run_period.setDateNumericValue(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_poll_frequency * 60000);
		jobGR.update();
	},
	
	updateJobName: function(azureConfigDefinitionGR){
		if(gs.nil(azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job)){
			gs.error("Azure Queue Probe Runner: Job not found for name update on {0}",azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_name);
			return;
		}
		var jobGR = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_scheduled_job.getRefRecord();
		jobGR.name = "Azure Queue Config Probe Scheduled Job: " + azureConfigDefinitionGR.getDisplayValue();
		jobGR.update();
	},
	
	runProbe: function(azureConfigDefinitionGR){
		var queueName = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_queue_name.getValue();
		var deleteMessagesFlag = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_delete_messages_after_receipt.toString();
		var numberOfMessages = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_max_messages_per_request.getValue();
		var numberOfRequests = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_max_requests_per_poll.getValue();
		var credentialId = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_credentials.discovery_credentials.getValue();
		var storageAccountID = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_storage_account.object_id;
		var storageAccountName = azureConfigDefinitionGR.u_storage_account.name;
		
		var probe = SncProbe.get('Azure-Queue-Config-JS');
		probe.addParameter("credential_id",credentialId);
		probe.addParameter("deleteMessages",deleteMessagesFlag);
		probe.addParameter("numberOfMessages",numberOfMessages);
		probe.addParameter("maxRequests",numberOfRequests);
		probe.addParameter('queueName',queueName);
		probe.addParameter("storageAccountID",storageAccountID);
		probe.addParameter('storageAccountName',storageAccountName);
		
		var msf = new MIDServerFinder();
		msf.setCapabilities(["Azure"]);
		
		return probe.create(msf.getMIDServers()[0]);
	},
	
	type: 'AzureQueueProbeRunner'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-21 16:53:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>4abfe098dbde9b009c69f8231f961970</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureQueueProbeRunner</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4abfe098dbde9b009c69f8231f961970</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 18:32:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="discovery_sensor"><discovery_sensor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><agent/><apply_defaults>true</apply_defaults><classification_type/><coalesce/><condition_script/><data_option>insert_update</data_option><data_source/><description/><external_names/><java_class/><major_version>1</major_version><minor_version>0</minor_version><name>AzureQueue-ConfigSensor</name><order/><parent/><reacts_to_probe display_value="Azure-Queue-Config-JS">094ea098dbde9b009c69f8231f96191d</reacts_to_probe><script><![CDATA[new DiscoverySensor({
    process: function(result) {
        if (gs.nil(result.output))
            return;
		
		var output = JSON.parse(result.output);
		
        for (var i=0;i<output.length;i++){
			var queryParamsStr = '';

			var headers = {};
			headers['user-agent'] = 'IcMBroadcaster';
			
			var eventGr = new GlideRecord('sn_cmp_cloud_event');
			eventGr.initialize();
			eventGr.setValue('payload', GlideStringUtil.base64Decode(output[i]));
			eventGr.setValue('headers', global.JSON.stringify(headers));
			eventGr.setValue('source', 'azure activity log');
			eventGr.setValue('query_params', queryParamsStr);
			eventGr.insert();
		}
    },

    type: "DiscoverySensor"
});]]></script><sensor_type>Javascript</sensor_type><sys_class_name>discovery_sensor</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-21 16:48:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>bdaeac18dbde9b009c69f8231f9619f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureQueue-ConfigSensor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>discovery_sensor_bdaeac18dbde9b009c69f8231f9619f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 16:51:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>data_source</type><xml_root_node/></discovery_sensor></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Patch to override which token manager is used to address PRB1281581 temporarily</description><name>AzureStorageTokenManager_ConfigPatch</name><script><![CDATA[var AzureStorageTokenManager_ConfigPatch = Class.create();
AzureStorageTokenManager_ConfigPatch.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AzureStorageTokenManager, {
	
	// Converts the query into a key and value pair
	// Example input: "restype=container&comp=list"
	// Example ouptut: "resttype:container\ncomp:list"
	getKeyValue: function(query) {
		if(!query){
			return '';
		}
		var resourceStr = '';
		
		var arr  = query.split("&");
		// mid-output here: array of string with values : restype=container,comp=list
		var last = arr.length - 1;
		for(var i = last; i >= 0; --i) {
			var str = arr[i];
			var arr1 = str.split("=");
			resourceStr += arr1[0] + ":" + arr1[1];
			for (var i2=2;i2<arr1.length;i2++) {
				resourceStr+="="+arr1[i2];
			}
			// in case of there  is just one element in the array or it's a last element, skip following code
			if (i != 0) {
				resourceStr += "\n";
			}
		}
		
		return resourceStr;
	},
	
    type: 'AzureStorageTokenManager_ConfigPatch'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-21 13:51:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b6164810db9e9b009c69f8231f961948</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureStorageTokenManager_ConfigPatch</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cloud API" source="sn_capi">0f7325250b21220033bc05ae37673a53</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_b6164810db9e9b009c69f8231f961948</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 14:53:01</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Patch to override which token manager is used to address PRB1281581 temporarily</description><name>AzureStorageAPIInvoker_ConfigPatch</name><script><![CDATA[var AzureStorageAPIInvoker_ConfigPatch = Class.create();
AzureStorageAPIInvoker_ConfigPatch.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AzureStorageAPIInvoker, {
	
	getToken: function(headers) {
		var tokenMgr = new AzureStorageTokenManager_ConfigPatch();
		var method = this.method || 'get';
		var token = tokenMgr.getStorageAuthorization(this.endpointUrl, method, headers, this.accountName, this.accountKey);
		return token;
	},

	type: 'AzureStorageAPIInvoker_ConfigPatch'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-21 13:58:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3ca74850db9e9b009c69f8231f961936</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AzureStorageAPIInvoker_ConfigPatch</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cloud API" source="sn_capi">0f7325250b21220033bc05ae37673a53</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_3ca74850db9e9b009c69f8231f961936</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 14:46:54</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_azure_config_queue_integration</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_azure_config_queue_integration">u_max_messages_per_requestVALCHANGES^u_max_messages_per_request>32^ORu_max_messages_per_request<1^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_max_messages_per_request" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_max_messages_per_request" goto="false" newquery="false" operator=">" or="false" value="32"/><item endquery="false" field="u_max_messages_per_request" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="<" or="true" value="1"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate Max Messages</name><order>10</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if(current.u_max_messages_per_request<1){
		current.u_max_messages_per_request = 1;
		gs.addInfoMessage('Max Messages must be between 1 and 32.  Resetting to 1');
	}
	if(current.u_max_messages_per_request>32){
		current.u_max_messages_per_request = 32;
		gs.addInfoMessage('Max Messages must be between 1 and 32.  Resetting to 32');
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-21 20:03:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>8efadd14db52db009c69f8231f96198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Max Messages</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8efadd14db52db009c69f8231f96198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 20:03:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8efadd14db52db009c69f8231f96198c"/></record_update>
